body:
Comment 2 by **dustyisawilson**: 
I'd like to know how to deal with the error.  Am I supposed to use a regular expression
to figure out what sort of error occurred?  Also, there is no good reason for this to be
inconsistent.  If the issue is that it just hasn't been made consistent, that's fine,
but that doesn't mean that it should stay that way.  If there is a different reason,
it'd be nice to see that reason explained.
